title: (x) Thin "Courier/sans" cross from TateEtc magazine - Everson Mono {Geoff}
content:
Anyone has a clue what this could be?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatthis.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223450/http:/typophile.com/files/whatthis.jpg) | 54.83 KB |
author: cicifoo

comments.content: I don't know this one but that _g_ and _e_ is just plain ugly.
:) It actually looks like an uglified courier sans... I like the e and g.. it brings a sort of quirkiness to it...
Found it, it's [Everson Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223450/http:/www.evertype.com/emono/index.html) by Michael Everson.

yay! it is! how the hell did you find it?  
tnx!
No offence intended (to you or the designer) but _g_ is so ugly, I figured that it had to be on dafont.com—which it was.
